sub_title:
Erkend Hypotheek Adviseur,
Financieel Adviseur
director AKN bv
summary:
Last 20 years I have created new concepts and developped them in succesfull profitable companies. In the late eighties I built up a mobile advertising company, creating new values in mobile advertising by researching the movement of people outdoors and creating a workable media planning system around it. 
In the beginning of the nineties my interest went into sponsored magazine concepts. We succesfully published the magazine Merhaba Turkiya and created new ideas for short distance inflight movies and a new concept sponsored magazine for Suzuki in the Netherlands. 
Since 1996 I am moving in the financial markets. Being the first company discovering the rapidly growing well to do senior citizen market we  decided to pitch fully on the senior market aged from 55-75 years old with personal loans. In less than 4 years we where market leader in the senior loan market.In this period we closed for about â‚¬ 10.000.000 personal loans.
Since 2005 we do fully pitch on morgages with the filosofy that we only want happy clients, happy clients bring you more clients. The best advertisement is a real testimonial. Word to mouth.  In this period most of the competitors wanted to make as much money as possible, a happy client was not heard about. We decided to offer no nonsense products and enhanced the filosofy you get what we promise. No advertising, no shouting around just word by mouth.
Since we do have low overhead costs we do not need to sell any nonsense products. Thats the key of todays succes

Specialties: Adviseren bij het vinden van de juiste hypotheek en bijkomende producten. Reeel, zeker, en gericht op persoonlijke dienstverlening binnen en buiten kantooruren, van eerste informatie verzoek tot en met de notaris.
